items.q: How can I apply for partner access to the FINN Partner Portal?
items.a: Via the form on this page. We verify your business license and activate you within 24 hours.

items.q: What costs are there for using the portal?
items.a: Registration and use is completely free. You only pay the vehicle price – no hidden fees or commissions.

items.q: What vehicle data and documentation is available?
items.a: For each vehicle: appraisals, configuration, COC, mileage, service history, photos and all relevant documents.

items.q: How does purchasing a vehicle in the portal work?
items.a: You can either place a bid or buy at the fixed price. No classic auction process with waiting times.

items.q: How does vehicle handover work after purchase?
items.a: Choose between free self-pickup or delivery directly to your location. All documents incl. registration certificate are available in the portal.

items.q: Can I export the vehicle inventory to my own system?
items.a: Yes, via Excel export or API connection you can easily transfer vehicle data to your own systems.

items.q: What vehicle types can we market through the FINN Partner Portal?
items.a: All vehicle types from fleets, leasing returns or rental cars. We focus on young used cars up to approx. 24 months.

items.q: How does the technical connection to the Partner Portal work?
items.a: We offer a REST API for automated data exchange, manual upload via dashboard or exchange via Excel spreadsheets – however you prefer.

items.q: Which dealers buy vehicles through the platform?
items.a: Over 2,000 verified commercial dealers in our pan-European network – from brand dealers to specialized used car traders.

items.q: How are residual values and prices for vehicles controlled?
items.a: You retain full control over prices. We provide comprehensive market data and recommendations for optimal pricing.

items.q: What reports and analyses are available for suppliers?
items.a: Real-time dashboards for sales, standing times and residual value development – all transparent in your personal portal.

items.q: What services can we use in addition to marketing?
items.a: We offer modular full-service solutions: deregistration, appraisal, logistics and transport – flexibly bookable, exactly what you need.
